title: The  Accelerated Programme for the Development of Middle Income 	Housing & Infrastructure
decision_details: - As per the approval granted by the Cabinet, the project proposals have been called for the implementation of the Project of the Development of Middle Income Housing and Infrastructure, in eight (08) plots of land, belonging to the National Housing Development Authority (NHDA), situated in different areas of the Island, with the participation of local and foreign investors and the developers. Accordingly, the Cabinet noted the information/matters submitted by Hon. Sajith Premadasa, the Minister of Housing and Construction, that, it has been recommended by the Steering Committee appointed to implement this project, to implement the housing projects in the areas of Panadura, Homagama (Jalthara Stage II), Yakkala and Ragama and to recall project proposals for the housing projects in the areas of Kundasale, Homagama, Galle and Nittambuwa.
